articles.title: Crimes Committed by Unification Minister Exposed
articles.content:
Crimes Committed by Unification Minister Exposed
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea Wednesday released an article dealing with the crimes committed by traitor Hyon In Thaek, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, against reunification and the nation.
					 The most hideous crime committed by him was that he wantonly violated and scrapped the historic north-south declarations, the article points out, and continues:
					
					 No sooner had Hyon held the post as puppet minister of Unification than openly denied the inter-Korean declarations at the "National Assembly" hearing, asserting that the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration were the documents which were not ratified by the NA and the south was not duty-bound to implement them.
					
					 He did not allow the utterance of word declaration in the ministry and retrogressively revised all kinds of laws and regulations enacted during the preceding regime.
					
					He is the author of watchwords "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars", an anti-DPRK confrontational policy, and an arch criminal who drove the inter-Korean relations to a catastrophe. He blustered that to expect any improvement in the south-north relations and cooperation from the north possessed of nukes is as foolish an act as trying to obtain fish from a tree.
					
					 This traitor dropped a check bar on the north-south dialogue, contacts, exchange and cooperation that had been brisk since the publication of the June 15 joint declaration. Hyon slandered the DPRK's sincere efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations as a "change in its tactics" and "lack of sincerity" and scuttled all the hard-won dialogues and contacts under the pretext of "adhering to the principle." He got frantic in the confrontation with the DPRK under the pretext of the puppet warship case, completely derailing even the NGO cooperation projects which had been barely kept afloat. 
					
					 This die-hard confrontational maniac has zealously involved himself in the anti-DPRK confrontational racket with extreme bitterness toward fellow countrymen. He raved that the "north is not a fair-minded neighbor" and "the south cannot co-exist with the north in this bright world."
					
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that he has gone reckless to realize his wild ambition for "unification under liberal democracy" in a bid to bring down even the system of the DPRK, talking about "contingency" and the like.
					
					 He, far from feeling guilty conscience for the prevailing grave situation in which the inter-Korean relations are facing a catastrophe, made a mockery of the public opinion by vociferating about "upright south-north relations" and the "south-north relations heading for normal orbit." He even cried out for invariably maintaining the mainstay of the confrontational "policy toward the north."
					
					 The south Koreans and all other Koreans have already passed a death sentence on traitor Hyon and he is fated to be ousted from his office sooner or later. 
					
					 He will keenly realize what high price he will have to pay for his acts of treachery.

articles.title: DPRK Beats Brazil 1-0: U-20 Women's World Cup
articles.content:
DPRK Beats Brazil 1-0: U-20 Women's World Cup
Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup 2010 started in Germany on Tuesday.
					 There was a match between the DPRK and Brazilian teams in Bielefeld that day.
					
					 The DPRK defeated Brazil 1:0 as Ho Un Byol opened the score in the 24th minute in the second half.
					
					 The world cup brought together teams from 16 countries and regions, and the DPRK team belongs to Group B of group league matches with Brazil, New Zealand and Sweden.

articles.title: Premier League Soccer Matches Go On
articles.content:
Premier League Soccer Matches Go On
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The fourth round of the premier league soccer matches is going on at Kim Il Sung Stadium from June 10.
					 Participating in the matches are eleven men's teams and eight women's teams.
					
					 The Sobaeksu men's team and the April 25 women's team finished first in the previous round.
					
					 As of July 6, the two teams stand first to be followed by the April 25 men's team and the Amnokgang women's team.
					
					 The fourth round continues till July 17.

articles.title: "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Published
articles.content:
"Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works" Published
Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Vol. 87 of "Complete Collection of Kim Il Sung's Works", a library of the immortal Juche idea, systematically and comprehensively dealing with President Kim Il Sung's works in a chronological order was brought out in the DPRK. The book contains 39 works including historic conclusions, talks and speeches made by the President from Jan. to Dec. Juche 77 (1988).
					The President in his works put forward the ideas and theories and policies for consolidating the revolutionary position as firm as a rock as required by the developing reality and more dynamically pushed forward the socialist construction.
					
					The President in his work "It Is the Great Honor and Pride of Our Party and People to Have Successfully Solved the Issue of Succession to the Revolutionary Cause of Juche" clarified the idea of creditably carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, holding General Secretary Kim Jong Il in high esteem at the head of the party and the revolution. 
					
					The work "Let Us Accomplish the Cause of Socialism and Communism under the Revolutionary Banner of Juche" gives a perfect answer to the question concerning the line and tasks to be carried out to accomplish the cause of socialism for achieving independence of the popular masses.
					
					The works including "On Firmly Holding up the Revolutionary Banner of Juche and Vigorously Accelerating Socialist Construction," and "On Successfully Organizing and Commanding the 200-day Campaign" clearly indicate the principle, tasks and ways arising in speeding up the socialist economic construction.
					
					The book clarifies theoretical and practical issues arising in the revolution and construction such as the issue of sprucing up the area of Mt. Paektu as a great open air museum to intensify the education in the revolutionary traditions, the issue of building Pyongyang, the capital of the revolution, into a more magnificent and beautiful city, the issue of bringing about a new turn in the fields of science, education and public health and international affairs.

articles.title: Green Pine Perfume Developed
articles.content:
Green Pine Perfume Developed
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Natural Perfume Institute developed and introduced very efficacious green pine perfume into various fields.
					  Generating ozone in the air, this green pine perfume, natural perfume, helps people feel refreshed and it is widely used in the environmental protection, public health and food industry and other fields for its wonderful efficacy.
					
					 The institute succeeded in producing the above-said perfume on the basis of a scientific clarification that essential oil extracted from pine trees, pine-nut trees and other trees is of diverse nature such as sedation, antibiosis, insect-killing and the adjustment of plant growth.
					
					 This perfume giving off the same fresh fragrance as that of pine and citrus fruit is good for the prevention and treatment of the high blood pressure, cerebral hemorrhage and thrombosis and the enhancement of heart function and treatment of diabetes, stomach trouble, etc. as it helps reduce cholesterol level to normal, promotes digestion and purifies blood.
					
					 It is particularly good for protecting the health of computer users, developing IQ of children and increasing the kinesthetic reaction of sportspersons. It is also good for keeping the air in the room fresh.
					
					 This product got a state goods certificate and state patent and won a gold prize at an international patent technology and trade fair held in China.

articles.title: Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Wins Popularity in China
articles.content:
Opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" Wins Popularity in China
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The opera "A Dream of Red Mansions" has been performed in different cities of China, winning a great admiration from the audience. It was recreated by the Phibada Opera Troupe of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea to meet the requirements of a new century.
					 President Kim Il Sung saw to it that a Chinese classic "A Dream of Red Mansions" was adapted for a classical opera early in the 1960s in order to make a contribution to the ideological and emotional education of the people and provide them with a good knowledge of the world culture.
					
					 The opera of historical significance was recreated a few years ago, enjoying Kim Jong Il's energetic guidance on several occasions.
					
					 The recreation of the opera was completed successfully in less than a year with the precious experience gained in creating the five revolutionary operas employed in all spheres such as orchestration, dance, pangchang (off-stage song) and stage art.
					
					 The opera is performed mainly by young actors and actresses.
					
					 After seeing the performance, Chinese people said that the opera was a world-famous masterpiece which could be created only in Korea and that all of the art works created under the guidance of 
						Kim Jong Il were great.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Moves Up Victory in War with Three Strikes
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Moves Up Victory in War with Three Strikes
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung moved up the final victory in the Fatherland Liberation War by completely smashing the U.S. imperialists' aggressive moves with three rounds of strikes in the fourth stage of the war (June 11, 1951-July 27, 1953).
					 Although the U.S. imperialists failed in their last-ditch effort, called "new offensive", early in 1953, they intensified aerial bombing on the rear of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea in an attempt to bring its army and people into submission.
					
					 The President, with a profound analysis of the prevailing situation, laid down an operational plan to frustrate the enemy's attempt with strong strikes and hasten the victory in the war.
					
					 In line with the plan, the officers and men of the Korean People's Army (KPA) stubbornly defended their positions and, at the same time, made counterattacks on the enemy.
					
					 The combined units of the KPA launched a strike at the enemy in all fronts on May 13.
					
					 The enemy suffered serious losses from the 10-odd-day-long first strike and fell into disorder.
					
					 The combined units promptly made a second strike at the targets predefined by the President.
					
					 Shocked by the two rounds of strike, the enemy reinforced their forces in major fronts and kept on bombing.
					
					 The KPA units, under the leadership of the President, dealt a fatal blow to the U.S. imperialists from July 13 to 27 to conclude the war triumphantly.

articles.title: Japan's Ambition for Overseas Aggression under Fire
articles.content:
Japan's Ambition for Overseas Aggression under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Japan recently decided to dispatch its Maritime "Self-Defence Force" to the U.S.-led RIMPAC multinational military exercises to be staged in the Pacific. The largest-ever joint military exercises will reportedly be staged in Okinawa with the troops of Japan, the U.S. and others involved, timed to coincide with RIMPAC.
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					 The objective of the RIMPAC is obviously to take a military and strategic initiative in the Asia-Pacific region, boost the capability to mount a strategic preemptive attack on it for realizing the wild ambition for world hegemony and, at the same time, put political and military pressure upon the countries in the region.
					
					 Japan is contemplating openly participating in the above-said multinational joint military exercises, departing from the past practice. Through this it seeks to help the SDF gain experience in military activities through joint military exercises with other countries including the U.S. and expand the sphere of its activities in a bid to round off conditions and capabilities for realizing overseas military expansion.
					
					 By making the above-said decision the Japanese reactionaries once again brought to light their true colors as aggressors who watch for a chance to kick off overseas aggression, not dropping their old dream of realizing "the Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Their reckless moves for overseas expansion are as foolish an act as jumping out of the frying pan into the fire. The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to bear this in mind and behave with discretion.

articles.title: S. Korea's Dependence on Foreign Forces Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korea's Dependence on Foreign Forces Blasted
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- During his recent junket to countries in the Americas traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea cooked up what was called "special declaration" while begging for "international cooperation and support" over the case of warship sinking. 
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says:
					
					 Such behavior is a revelation of the south Korean puppet authorities' inveterate sycophancy and extreme frenzy for confrontation with fellow countrymen. It is a sinister hostile action intended to intensify sanctions and pressure upon the DPRK with the help of foreign forces. 
					
					 The case of warship sinking is not an issue to be handled outside south Korea. 
					
					 As a poor conspiratorial farce whose falsity has been fully disclosed, the case has become an object of bitter accusation and ridicule at home and abroad. 
					
					 The UN Security Council brought the debate on this case to an end by publishing a presidential statement that lacks clear-cut judgment or conclusion. 
					
					 The reality proves that it is by no means a solution to internationalize the case of warship sinking. 
					
					 The DPRK remains unchanged in the stand to probe the truth about the case to the last now that the south Korean ruling quarters are persistently linking it with the DPRK for no ground. The solution to this issue under the present situation is for the south Korean authorities to receive the inspection group of the DPRK National Defence Commission and conduct an inter-Korean joint investigation.

articles.title: Thorough Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Called for
articles.content:
Thorough Probe into Truth behind "Cheonan" Case Called for
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- The United Nations Security Council recently issued its presidential statement in which it noted that the UNSC takes note of the stand of the DPRK that it has nothing to do with the case of the sunk warship "Cheonan" of south Korea. This amounted to a failure of a despicable conspiratorial diplomacy of hostile forces. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in a signed commentary.  It goes on:
					
					 The "Cheonan" case, the farce orchestrated by the south Korean puppet forces at the instigation of the U.S., aroused a lot of suspicions internally and externally and sparked off furor as it was beset with many doubts and contradictions from the very day of its occurrence. 
					
					 It was the real intention of the U.S. to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war by orchestrating such charade.
					
					 The U.S., Japan and the south Korean puppet authorities groundlessly laid the blame for the case at the door of the DPRK without producing any scientific and objective evidence. It was quite natural that this wrong attitude could hardly convince the international community.
					
					 Fabrications and plots would get them nowhere. The hectic diplomacy of those despicable tricksters to do harm to the DPRK ended in failure, bringing only shame and disgrace, in the final analysis.
					
					 Lies and fabrications can no longer work in this bright world. Integrity and justice are sure to win people's mindset and emerge victorious. The above-said case clearly taught the international community this truth and lesson.
					
					 The DPRK, the victim of the case, will probe the truth behind it to the last and make those responsible for it pay dearly for it.

articles.title: Open Verification of Warship "Cheonan" Case Urged
articles.content:
Open Verification of Warship "Cheonan" Case Urged
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- American university professors So Jae Jong and Ri Sung Hon at a press conference in Tokyo called for an open verification of the "results of the investigation" into the case of the sunk warship "Cheonan", according to the south Korean Kyunghyang Daily News dated July 10.
					 They held that the "results of the investigation" announced by the "joint investigation team" are suspected of being forged.
					
					They declared that the south Korean authorities produced letters "No. 1" as evidence proving that the torpedo at issue belonged to the north but it is hardly understandable that the part of the torpedo bearing the letters was left undamaged after the explosion though its other parts were burnt down.
					
					 They urged the south Korean authorities to open all data related to the case and opt for verification aimed at reconfirming them.

articles.title: Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
articles.content:
Immortal Exploits of Kim Il Sung Praised
 Pyongyang, July 14 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings, book and photo exhibitions and film shows took place in Pakistan, Bangladesh, Indonesia, India, Ukraine and Finland between July 3 and 7 on the occasion of the 16th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display in the venues were books and photos on the Songun leadership exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meetings.
					
					 Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, said that Kim Il Sung was the genuine people's father who devoted his all to the happiness of the people. The Korean people hold him in high esteem as father of socialist Korea and eternal President of the DPRK, he added.
					
					 Vishwanath, director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, S. P. Pathak, chairman of the Indian Society for the Study of Works of Kim Jong Il, and other speakers praised the President as the distinguished thinker-theoretician who showed the bright road ahead of the world's oppressed people, the ever-victorious iron-willed commander who defeated the two imperialist formidable enemies in one generation, the genius of creation and construction who built a socialist power, independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, in Korea and the tender-hearted father who took warm care of all people.
					
					 Kalevi Warman, chairman of the Finnish Communists' League, stressed that they would always remember the revolutionary exploits of Kim Il Sung and as ever extend support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were Korean films "Fireworks for a Thriving Nation" and "Pyongyang at Night".
					
					 Messages and letter to General Secretary Kim Jong Il were adopted at the events in India, Finland and Pakistan.
					
					 Saber Ballul, head of department of the Political Faculty of University of Damascus in Syria, released a statement on July 5 on the same occasion.

articles.title: RPDC derrota a Brasil en las clasificatorias del mundial sub-20
articles.content:
RPDC derrota a Brasil en las clasificatorias del mundial sub-20
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ATCC) -- Quedo iniciada el dia 13 en Alemania la Copa Mundial Femenina Sub-20 de la FIFA 2010.
					Ese dia, la seleccion coreana y la brasilena realizaron el duelo en Bielefeld.
					
					En este encuentro la RPDC gano a Brasil gracias al unico gol marcado por Ho Un Byol a los 24 minutos del segundo tiempo.
					
					Ademas de ambos equipos, pertenecen al grupo B de las clasificatorias Nueva Zelanda y Suecia.
					
					En este evento futbolistico participan los equipos de 16 paises y regiones.

articles.title: Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de expansion a ultramar de Japon
articles.content:
Minju Joson denuncia ambicion de expansion a ultramar de Japon
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, Japon tomo la decision de enviar sus "fuerzas maritimas de autodefensa" para que se incorporaran en los ejercicios militares multinacionales "Rimpac" que se desarrollan en el Pacifico bajo el mando de Estados Unidos. Ademas, coincidiendo con ese simulacro, se desarrollara en Okinawa un ejercicio militar conjunto de gran envergadura nunca vista en la historia en el cual participan Japon, EE.UU. y otros paises. 
					El simulacro "Rimpac" tiene por objetivo tomar la iniciativa militar-estrategica sobre la region de Asia-Pacifico, consolidar la capacidad estrategica de ataque preventivo para realizar la ambicion de dominio al mundo y, al mismo tiempo, presionar en lo politico y militar a los paises de esta region. 
					
					Senala el rotativo Minju Joson en un comentario individual difundido en su edicion de este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					Japon intenta participar oficialmente en ese simulacro multinacional violando sus costumbres anteriores con el fin de perfeccionar la capacidad y las condiciones favorables a la realizacion de su ambicion de expansion militar a ultramar al acumular las experiencias de actividades militares de las "Fuerzas de autodefensa" mediante los ejercicios militares conjuntos con EE.UU. y otros paises y ampliar la esfera de sus actividades.
					
					 Por lo tanto, tal decision de Japon muestra una vez mas claramente que los reaccionarios japoneses acechan la oportunidad propicia para la agresion a ultramar sin abandonar su sueno antiguo de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental". 
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses deben actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de que las imprudentes maniobras de expansion a ultramar les llevaran a la autodestruccion.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica la gira americana de Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica la gira americana de Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ATCC) -- Durante su reciente gira por paises americanos, el traidor Lee Myung Bak suplico la "cooperacion internacional" y el "apoyo" en el tema de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" y fraguo la llamada "declaracion especial". 
					En un comentario individual divulgado el dia 14 al respecto, el diario Rodong Sinmun califico tal proceder de los titeres surcoreanos de expresion de su cronico servilismo a grandes potencias y fanatismo por la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					Esa sucia accion hostil a la RPDC se encamina a endurecer la sancion y la presion contra esta en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras, precisa el comentarista y continua:
					
					El incidente de hundimiento de la corbeta surcoreana "Cheonan" no es un asunto a ser discutido en las afueras del Sur de Corea.
					
					Este caso inventado por los mismos titeres surcoreanos suscita una fuerte censura y burla dentro y fuera del pais por ser un complot de punta a cabo.
					
					El Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU finalizo el debate de ese tema limitandose a publicar hace poco una declaracion del presidente carente del correcto juicio o conclusion por el respecto.
					
					La situacion comprueba que la internacionalizacion del caso del "Cheonan" no es la solucion del problema.
					
					Sigue invariable la posicion de la RPDC de esclarecer hasta el final la verdad de ese incidente, puesto que las fuerzas surcoreanas en el poder se obstinan en vincularla con el incidente.
					
					Bajo estas circunstancias, la solucion del problema esta en que las autoridades surcoreanas admitan al grupo de inspeccion del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y realicen la investigacion conjunta entre ambas partes coreanas.

articles.title: RPDC esclarecera caso de la corbeta "Cheonan", subraya Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
RPDC esclarecera caso de la corbeta "Cheonan", subraya Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 14 de julio (ATCC) -- Recientemente, el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU hizo publica la declaracion del presidente senalando que presta atencion a la posicion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea de no tener nada que ver con el caso de hundimiento del buque de guerra "Cheonan" del Sur de Corea.
					 Esto deviene el fracaso de la diplomacia intrigante de las fuerzas hostiles a la RPDC.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual del dia 14 y continua:
					
					  Desde el principio, el incidente del "Cheonan", farsa inventada por los titeres surcoreanos a instigacion de Estados Unidos, fue sospechado seriamente y produjo un revuelo dentro y fuera del pais por ser muy dubitativo y contradictorio.
					
					  Mediante esa farsa, EE.UU. intentaba realmente llevar al borde de guerra la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					  Es imposible que la sociedad internacional se deje llevar por EE.UU., Japon y las autoridades titeres surcoreanas que tildan injustamente a la RPDC de "sospechosa" sin presentar ninguna prueba cientifica y objetiva.
					
					  No se puede ganar nada con falsificaciones e intrigas. 
					
					  En fin, aunque se movieron con mucho jaleo para calumniar a la RPDC pretextando el caso del "Cheonan", los conspiradores no pudieron conseguir nada mas que la verguenza y el cansancio.
					
					  En el mundo claro de hoy, la mentira y la falsificacion no podran salir con la suya mientras la inocencia y la justicia ganaran la opinion publica y la victoria. Esta verdad y leccion las graba ahora en su mente la sociedad internacional viendo en desenlace del incidente del "Cheonan".
					
					  La RPDC, victima del caso, aclarara hasta el fin la verdad y ajustara la cuenta.
